divs: Sighting Details the objects being 2 of them appeared as stars, but what got my attention is that they were moving across the sky, at first i thought they were just planes , then i noticed their was 2 objects flying in formation , one behind the other, i saw no flashing lights , only bright star like objects, very high in altitude and traveling at very great speed, the first object seemed to climb in altitude , while doing so light would dim almost till it seemed to go out then light would be bright again, second object following would follow suit . it was as though i saw them enter one side of the state and within a minutes time they were at the other side of state. i could here no noise as you would with normal aircraft.i was fishing on a lake at the time, however their were many stars in the sky this night, but nothing like what i saw.i really felt like i was watching a sci-fi movie. i lost sight of object becaus it was just gone appearing as though it traveled out of sight
Summary: 2 objects like stars travelling at high altitudes and great speed in formation while dimming and brightening.
